    • Method Detail

      • loadImages

        public void loadImages(java.lang.String[] fileNames)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method to load images from disk
        Parameters:
        fileNames - A String array containing names of the files to load. The default directory for the files is /src/main/resources/. The images should be of same size.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • computeSharpestPixels

        public void computeSharpestPixels()
        Compute the shrarpest image for each pixel position. Constructs an integer matrix of the same size as the images that contains the index numbers of the sharpest images on each pixel position.

      • saveImage

        public void saveImage(java.lang.String outputFileName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and saves the stacked image.
        Parameters:
        outputFileName - Name of the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • printSharpestPixelIndexes

        public void printSharpestPixelIndexes()
        Prints out a 2D int array of the sharpest pixel indexes Utility method for debugging
